div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Group|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Group` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Group`. Element `Group` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group`.
Element `Group.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.meta`.
Element `Group.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.implicitRules`.
Element `Group.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.language`.
Element `Group.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.text`.
Element `Group.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.contained`.
Element `Group.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.identifier`.
Element `Group.active` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.active`.
Element `Group.type` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.type`.
Element `Group.membership` is will have a context of Group based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Group`.
Element `Group.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.code`.
Element `Group.name` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.name`.
Element `Group.description` is will have a context of Group based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Group`.
Element `Group.quantity` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.quantity`.
Element `Group.managingEntity` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.managingEntity`.
Element `Group.characteristic` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.characteristic`.
Element `Group.characteristic.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.characteristic.code`.

Note that the target element context `Group.characteristic.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Group.characteristic`. Element `Group.characteristic.value[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.characteristic.value[x]`. Note that the target element context `Group.characteristic.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Group.characteristic`.
Element `Group.characteristic.exclude` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.characteristic.exclude`.
Element `Group.characteristic.period` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.characteristic.period`.
Element `Group.member` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.member`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Group.member.entity` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Group.member.entity` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.member.entity`.
Element `Group.member.period` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.member.period`.
Element `Group.member.inactive` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group.member.inactive`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

comment.value: FHIR R5 Resource `Group` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Group`. Element `Group` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Group`.
